SA15arhebt2u:2150: tadā tasyeha bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt?
SA15arhebt2u:2151: iti abhiprāyavatā ‘na'; kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedo na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2154: ubhayaṃ caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭamiti darśayannāha- "yathā" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:2155: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve 'pyanekarūpatā /
SA15arhebt2u:2157: tatra sāmagryantarajanyāt tāvad bhedaṃ darśayati- "mṛtpiṇḍāt" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:2158_1: tadanyajanyebhyo 'bhinnasvabhāvāni yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇameva samagrāṇi
SA15arhebt2u:2159: tathā hi- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣādervilakṣaṇamevopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2162: evaṃ kulālādikamapi tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryaṃ karoti tadvilakṣaṇameva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2163: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopadānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayastebhyo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:2164_2: tadanyebhyo yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍastadanyanimittasahita upādānamiṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:2165_3: ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmādekaikakāryād dvidvikāryācca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād
SA15arhebt2u:2165_4: bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparamasaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2170_1: kāryāṇi bhavanti "tat" tasmāt "evam" uktena prakāreṇa kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitādanyasāmagryantarbhūtāt
SA15arhebt2u:2172: na mṛdaḥ kevalāyāḥ tatsāmagrībahirbhūtāyāḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ kulālopādānopakṛtāyā eva mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakakāryahetutvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2174_0: tadevaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhedaṃ kāryasyodāharaṇe pratipādya sahakāriṇāmanekatve 'pyanekātmatāvirahaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:2174_1: pratipādayannāha- "na ca tayoḥ" mṛtkulālayoḥ sahitayoḥ parasparopādānopakṛtātmanoḥ
SA15arhebt2u:2174_2: yaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ pratyayāntarasahitāvasthāto viśiṣṭā yogyatā tadviṣayasya tadanyāvasthāviṣayād
SA15arhebt2u:2177: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya /
SA15arhebt2u:2181_2: parasparātmatāviraheṇa kāraṇena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa mṛt na pratibhāseta,
SA15arhebt2u:2184: na hi yo yasya svabhāvo na bhavati sa tenātmanā svagrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāsate,
SA15arhebt2u:2185: rūparasavat; jñānaṃ vā tadrūpavikalārthasāmarthyenotpadyamānaṃ tadrūpamanukartuṃ yuktam,
SA15arhebt2u:2187: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayorekātmataiveti na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī,
SA15arhebt2u:2188: yato bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ ekakāryotpattivirodhādekarūpatayā teṣāṃ sādhāraṇaikakāryakriyā,
SA15arhebt2u:2191_1: ca kāryāntarasyāpi yathā ekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcidekaṃ nāsti tathā'nekapratyayajanitamapīti
SA15arhebt2u:2192: tata ekakāryāpekṣayā'nekatvaprasañjane sandigdhavyatirekatā, sāmānyena sādhane siddhasādhyateti ca /
SA15arhebt2u:2194: nanu ca mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣayorekasvabhāvatve 'pyahrīkādibhiḥ saṅkhayādibhedād bheda iṣyate tatkathamanekapratyayajanitasyaikatve etadudāharaṇam syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:2195: sarvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhayāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāccābheda iṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2197: tathā hi- eko ghaṭaḥ rūpādayo bahava iti saṅkhyābhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2200: vyāvṛttilakṣaṇā bhedāḥ kṣaṇikāśca; jaiminīyasya tu kecit kālāntarasthāyino 'pīti lakṣaṇabhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2201: ghaṭenodakāharaṇaṃ kriyate, rūpādībhiḥ punarvasturāga iti kāryabhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2202: evaṃ sarvatra dravyaparyāyoḥ saṅkhayādibhirbhedaḥ deśādibhistvabheda iti mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ kathañcit bhedāt mṛtkulālābhyāṃ janitasya kāryasyānekatāstyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:2203: yathā tvekatā tathā tābhyāṃ tasya abhinnātmajanyataiveti yadanekakāraṇaṃ tadanekameva,
SA15arhebt2u:2204: yat punarekaṃ tat sahakāriṇāmabhinnarūpajanyatayaikakāraṇameveti na vyabhicāra iti /
SA15arhebt2u:2208: svabhāvato bhedopagame vāparasparātmatayā bhṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthānamṛtsvabhavaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaṃ durnivāram /
SA15arhebt2u:2209: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmadharmiṇoḥ, saṅkhayādibhedādapi naiva bhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2210: na hi pararūpāḥ bhidyamānā api saṅkhayādaya ātmabhūtamabhedaṃ bādhituṃ samarthāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2213: na ca bahuvacanasya niyamenādarśanād rūpādayo 'tra nimittam,
SA15arhebt2u:2214: rūpādinimittatve hi guruḥ iti na kadācidekavacanaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2218: brīhaya iti ca jātivacane dharmiṇo rūpādīnāṃ cānabhidhānāt na kiñciduttaram /
SA15arhebt2u:2219: ubhayarūpasya ca vastuno guruśabdavācyatvāt kathaṃ sambhavino dharmirūpasyaikatvena vivakṣā? /
SA15arhebt2u:2227: atrāpi indanāt śakanāt dāraṇācca śaktibhedo gamyata iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:2230: na hi śaktireva indati śankoti dārayati ca /
SA15arhebt2u:2234: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācidarthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam? /
SA15arhebt2u:2237: tathā hi- na kūṭasthanityatayā nityaṃ dravyamahrīkairiṣyate, [Hbṭ_100] pariṇāmanityatopagamāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2240: paryāyā eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyamiti nityamabhyupagamyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2241: na ceyaṃ kūṭasthanityatā vā dravye sambhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:2249: tatra pūrvaṃ bhavati bhedanivandhanam yadīha sambhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:2252: paṭādayo 'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2255: yata ekasya kāraṇātmanaḥ ekakāryarūpatopagame tadanyarūpābhāvāt tadanyakāryātmatopagatirna syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2256: kintvapūrvameva kasyacid bhāve prāgavidyamānaṃ bhavat tatkāryam /
SA15arhebt2u:2257: tatra viṣayendriyamanaskārāṇāmitaretaropadānāhitarūpabhedānāṃ sannidhau viśiṣṭasvetarakṣaṇabhāve pratyekaṃ tadbhāvābhāvānuvidhānādanekakriyopagamo na virudhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2264: tataśca vijñānameva na kuryuḥ, tadaḥ yajananasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2266: tathā hi- te tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekaṃ viśiṣṭasajātīyetarakṣaṇajananātmakāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:2268: tatra vijñānajananasvabhāvataiveti tasyājananasvabhāvatā vyavacchidyate tasyā eva pratiyogitvāt nānyajananasvabhāvatā /
SA15arhebt2u:2270: na hi tadanyāpekṣayā viparyavyāvṛttimupādāyānekena śabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ vastu anekarūpatāṃ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2285: ekasyānekakriyānabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2291: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvadanekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ [Hbṭ_102] naikāntiko bhedaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2292: tathā hi- yamātmānaṃ purodhāyāyaṃ dharmī paryāyāścaite iti vyavasthāpyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2295: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2301: tataśca svasantānakṣaṇamitaropādānaṃ ca yugapadupakurvataḥ kathamekasyānekakāryatā na syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:2303: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatāmācakṣāṇa ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ?
SA15arhebt2u:2305: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedamabhidadhānaḥ sphuṭamahrīka evāyamityupekṣāmarhati /
SA15arhebt2u:2307_0: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaścaikasya
SA15arhebt2u:2308: na cātra śaktibhedo nibandhanam, yatastadekopakāranirapekṣāḥ kathametāḥ śaktayo niyatārthādhārāḥ?
SA15arhebt2u:2314: tathā hi- deśakālayorabhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ kathamabhedasiddhiḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2323: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyośca svabhāvatve lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2325: atrāpyabheda iti yadi sādṛśyamucyate; tad bheda eva sambhavati, sādṛśyasya sadṛśādhikaraṇatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2326: tataśca padārthadvayameva syāt na tvekaṃ dvirūpamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:2332: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ityucyate anekaḥ san? /
SA15arhebt2u:2336: yogyatvācca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānāmekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacidasambhavāt śaktibhedācca viṣayabhedaṃ brūvāṇaṃ prati abhihitam /
SA15arhebt2u:2338: tathā hi- śaśāṅkodayaṃ bahavo nirīkṣante tasya kathamekatvamabhyupagatam? /
SA15arhebt2u:2340: sarvathedaṃ na kathañcidapi saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:2341: vijñānaṃ tu nīlapraticchāyatayotpadyamānaṃ pītādipratibhāsavyavacchedena prativiśiṣṭaṃ khyāpyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2342: na punarasya bhāvato dve rūpe staḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2343: atha punardravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavadekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvīrūpamucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2346: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,
SA15arhebt2u:2349: jātyantaraṃ ca sa eva narasiṃhābhyāṃ syāt, na śabalarūpaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2353: iti kevalamanekatve 'pi bahuṣvekakāryadarśanāt senādivadekavyavahāradarśanakṛto 'yaṃ viparyāso jaḍamatīnām /
SA15arhebt2u:2356: tathā hi paryāyā abhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāśca paryāyarūpeṇa ca bhidyante pūrvoktācca dharmadharmiṇorniṣedhānnobhayavādasambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:2362: śabdānāṃ naiva, tat kena saṃjñābhedād vibhinnatā // 2 //
SA15arhebt2u:2368: vyāvṛttibhedaḥ kaścit syād, vastuno na kathaṃcana /
SA15arhebt2u:2377: viruddhadharmādhyāse 'pi, kena, bhūtaṃ ca kiṃ, yataḥ // 9 //
SA15arhebt2u:2379: bhinnaṃ paryāyarūpaṃ hi dravyarūpād bhaved yadi // 10 //
SA15arhebt2u:2380: tadaitat syādabhede tu naitat saṃbadhyate vacaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2386: svabhāvasyaiva bhedena kiṃ bhedaśca na kīrtitaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2387: na hi paścādbhavan bhedaḥ kāryāṇāṃ tasya bhedakaḥ // 14 //
SA15arhebt2u:2389: ekāntena vibhinne ca te syātāṃ vastunī sa ca // 15 //
SA15arhebt2u:2408: ekamiṣṭaṃ jananyā ca jāyāyāḥ kiṃ na caikatā? // 24 //
SA15arhebt2u:2410: pratyekaṃ ye prasajyante dvayorbhāve kathaṃ na te? // 25 //
SA15arhebt2u:2413: madhuraṃ na hi sarvaṃ syāt kaphaheturyathā madhu /
SA15arhebt2u:2414: tīkṣṇaṃ vā pittajanakaṃ yathā māgadhikā matā // 27 //
SA15arhebt2u:2415: pratyekaṃ yannidānaṃ yat svato miśraṃ tadātmakam /
SA15arhebt2u:2416: kinna dṛṣṭam? yathā māṣaḥ snigdhoṣṇaḥ kaphapittakṛt // 28 //
SA15arhebt2u:2419: ye bhedābheda mātre tu doṣāḥ sambhavinaḥ katham? /
SA15arhebt2u:2420: tatsadbhāve 'pi te na syuriti brūyād vicakṣaṇaḥ // 30 //
SA15arhebt2u:2423: bhāgā eva ca bhāsante sanniviṣṭāstathā tathā /
SA15arhebt2u:2432: aspaṣṭarūpā gamyante śabdebhyo 'pi ta eva hi /
SA15arhebt2u:2440: tayorapi bhaved bhedo yadi yenātmanā tayoḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2442: bheda eva tathā ca syānnaivekasya dvirūpatā /
SA15arhebt2u:2446: tasya bhedo 'pi tābhyāṃ ced yadi yenātmanā ca te /
SA15arhebt2u:2450: dharmitvaṃ tasya caivaṃ syāt tattantratvāt tadanyayoḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2451: na caivaṃ gamyate tena vādo 'yaṃ jālmakalpitaḥ // 45 //"
SA15arhebt2u:2453: tadevaṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayorekasvabhāvatve na kathañcidbhedasambhava iti sahakāriṇāmanekatve 'pi na kāryasyānekatvamityatra bhavatyetadudāharaṇamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:2459: tena yadi mṛtpiṇḍasya mṛdātmatāyāṃ vyāpāraḥ kulālasya tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣe kathyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2462: mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ svabhāvabhede dūṣaṇamuktam "mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā" [Hbṭ_108] ityādikamiti na saṃsthānasya mṛddravyādanyatvam /
SA15arhebt2u:2463_1: tatkāryakṣaṇasahakāriṇā mṛtpiṇḍena ca pratyekaṃ sakalameva mṛtsaṃsthānātmakaṃ kāryaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:2465: yat tad ghaṭagataṃ saṃsthānaṃ "yadi tata" mṛdo "bhinnaṃ syāt" tadā kulālaḥ pṛthageva kimiti na karoti? /
SA15arhebt2u:2467: kulālaścānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya saṃsthānasya guṇātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyata iti "sa pṛthagapi" tat "kuryāt" /
SA15arhebt2u:2469: "dravyāśrayya'guṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣvakāraṇamanapekṣa" iti guṇalakṣaṇāt sarvadā guṇo dravyaparatantraḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:2472: yadi svabhāvenaiva tasya guṇātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya "kriyāvad guṇavad" ityādivacanādādhārasvabhāvaṃ tat mṛddravyaṃ,
SA15arhebt2u:2473: saṃsthānaṃ vā tathāvidhaṃ kapālādheyātmakaṃ tadā kimiti kulālavyāpāramapekṣate? /
SA15arhebt2u:2474: svata eva kiṃ na bhavati? iti codakābhiprāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2475: evaṃ codyamāśaṅkaya vaiśeṣikaḥ parihāramāha- "na, tataḥ" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:2476_0: yat tat mṛddravyaṃ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ tayoryaḥ sambandha ādhārādheyalakṣaṇaḥ
SA15arhebt2u:2476_1: tatra yā "yogyatā" tāṃ "dvayamapyetat kulālād" yataḥ pratilabhate tasmāt "kulālamapekṣate"
SA15arhebt2u:2476_2: kulālānapekṣāyāṃ doṣamāha- "anyathā" yadi tayoḥ parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālāpekṣā
SA15arhebt2u:2476_3: na syāt tadā svabhāvata eva mṛtpiṇḍasya tathavidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatvaṃ bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:2477: tasmiṃśca sati vastuna eva tatsaṃsthānasambandhayogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti kulālasannidheḥ prāgapi saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi vaiśeṣikīyaścodyaparihāraḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2481: yadi parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālamapekṣate "evaṃ tarhi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavati iti" āpannam /
SA15arhebt2u:2483: yadi hi syāt tadā yogyatāyāḥ dravyāt pṛthakkaraṇaṃ "prāgvat prasajyeta" /
SA15arhebt2u:2484_0: atha yogyatāyā api yogyapāratantryādapṛthaksiddhiṃ brūyāt tadā tasyā api vastudharmatayaiva
SA15arhebt2u:2484_1: prāgapi samāveśo mā bhūditi dravyeṇa saha sambandhayogyatāyā anya yogyatā kulālād bhavatītyeṣṭavyā /
SA15arhebt2u:2486: pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge vā punaḥ sa eva parihāraḥ tadīyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:2489: kimevaṃ sati siddhaṃ bhavati? ityata āha- "asti tāvat" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:2490: mṛtpiṇḍakulālabhyāṃ kapāladravyasya saṃyogaviśeṣasambandhayogyasyārambhāt yadaikasvabhāvatve 'pyekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣatā tadā siddhaḥ āsmākīnaḥ pakṣaḥ /

SA15arhebt2u:4549: tasmāt tata eva hetorbhayaṃ tadabhāve hetuḥ prayoktavya evetyata āha- "sa tarhi" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4550: evaṃ tarhi paramārthena bādhā kimasti nāstītyetadanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iti kākvā pṛcchati /
SA15arhebt2u:4551: kadācit paro brūyāt- uktamevaitat kimarthaṃ pṛcchyate? ityāha- "kimarthaṃ prayujyata" iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4553: paro 'navagatābhiprāya āha- "sādhyasiddhyartham" iti bādhakapratyayābhāve pramāṇyasyeṣṭatvāt tataḥ sādhyasiddhiraviruddhaiveti manyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4554: siddhāntavādī satyāṃ bādhāyāṃ tadanupalambhe 'pi sādhyasiddhimasambhāvayan pṛcchati "sa kiṃ kvacid" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4555: kiṃ punarasau hetuḥ satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayediti sambhāvyate bhavatā yenāsyā bādhāyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca prayujyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4557: tathā satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthopagame satyabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:4560: taddhi hetorlakṣaṇamucyate yena vinā sādhyaṃ na sādhayediti /
SA15arhebt2u:4564: evaṃ hi sati bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvasambhave 'pi tāmabhyupagamya tadanupalambhamātreṇa hetoḥ prayogaḥ prāptaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4565_0: yadi hi bādhāmabhyupagamya hetuprayogo nābhimataḥ syāt tadānupalambhamātreṇa bādhāyaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:4565_1: saṃśayāt- satāmapi keṣāñcit kathañcidanupalambhasambhavāt- saṃśayitasya hetuprayoge
SA15arhebt2u:4566: tasmād yo yatsaṃśaye 'pi pravartate sa tasya bhāvapakṣamabhyupetyaiva pravartate /
SA15arhebt2u:4567: tathā ca yathā bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya hetuḥ prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi prayujyatām,
SA15arhebt2u:4568_1: hetulakṣaṇaṃ yujyata iti kuto bādhakapratyayavirahe 'pyasati pratibandhe prāmāṇyasya sambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4570: naiva hi bādhāyāṃ saṃtyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiṣyate tat kathaṃ tadupalambhe 'pi prayogaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:4571: siddhāntavādyāha- "yadyevaṃ" bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ heturasamartho yadīṣyate tadānirṇīto bādhāyā asaṃbhavo yasya hetoḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ prayogaṃ bādhānupalambhamātreṇa nārhati /
SA15arhebt2u:4573: mā bhūd bādhāyāḥ sambhavapakṣe "prayuktasyāpi" hetoḥ sādhyasiddhau "asāmarthyamiti" /
SA15arhebt2u:4574_0: pūrvapakṣavādyāha- bādhānupalambhe sati bādhāyā abhāvāt sadupalambhakapratyayābhāve
SA15arhebt2u:4574_1: satyavaśyamarthānāmasattvāddhetoḥ sāmarthyam iti cenmanyase siddhāntavādyāha- "kimupalambho bādhām" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4575: upalambho hyarthānāṃ kāryam, na ca kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyāpnoti /
SA15arhebt2u:4576: na hya'vaśyaṃ kāraṇāni kāryavanti bhavanti, pratibandhavaikalyasambhavāt /
SA15arhebt2u:4583: iti anenaiva nyāyena jñānanivṛttyā bādhānivṛtterityāha- ta- thāpi vyartho hetuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4588: tathā hi- yatra bādhāyā anupalambhastatra paramārthata eva sā na vidyata iti manyase /
SA15arhebt2u:4589: yatra cāsau paramārthato nāsti tatra sādhaydharmasyābhāvo 'pi paramārthenaiva nāstyanyathā paramārthena bādhāyā abhāvāyogāt /
SA15arhebt2u:4590: tataśca sādhyadharmasyābhāvābhāve sati bhāva iti bhavanmatyā sādhyapratītervyarthatā hetoriti /
SA15arhebt2u:4591: atha mā bhūd yuktivirodha iti nopalambhanivṛttau bādhānivṛttiriṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:4592_0: tatrāha- upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi satyāṃ bādhāyā anivṛttāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ tadavasthaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:4592_1: hetorasasāmarthyam yadavasthaṃ bādhopalambha iti hetoraprayoga iti kasyābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:4594_0: yata evaṃ vyāptyā hetoḥ sarvatra sādhyenāvinābhāvābhyupagame bahirvyāptāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ
SA15arhebt2u:4594_2: 'pyabhavanna'bhāve 'pi ca bhavan heturdharmiṇi kiñcit sādhyaṃ "na bhāvayati" na sādhayati
SA15arhebt2u:4594_3: "na vibhāvayati" tadviparītaṃ na niṣedhayati "iti" tasya vidhipratiṣedhāvakurvata
SA15arhebt2u:4598: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇenābādhā rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:4599: yadi nāma bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahāvasthānābhāvādavinābhāve [Hbṭ_212] satyabādhā gamyate rūpāntaraṃ tu kimiti na bhavati?
SA15arhebt2u:4602: lakṣaṇakāraiśca rūpāntaratvenopādānamarhati yasya viśeṣaṇasya bhāve 'pi yasyāparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:4603: yataḥ sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo na sambhava eva kevale /
SA15arhebt2u:4605: satyapi hi dharmisambandhe śrāvaṇatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāvo nāsti /
SA15arhebt2u:4606: satyapi ca cākṣuṣatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāve sādhyadharmiṇi śabde sambandho nāsti /
SA15arhebt2u:4608: ihāpyevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced āha- "na caitad" anantaroditamabādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:4609: satyavinābhāve niyamenābādhāyāḥ sambhavāvdyabhicārābhāvāt kuto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo kṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati?
SA15arhebt2u:4610: iti na hetoḥ sādhyāvinābhāvino viruddhasya ca sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvino viṣaye bādhā sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:4611: uktena prakāreṇa viparyaye samyaggheturevāviṣaye tu prayogāddhetvābhāsa ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4612: yata evam "iti" tasmānna tadabhāvo bādhāvirahaḥ pṛthagavinābhāvādanvayavyatirekātmano 'nayorhetuviruddhayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:4614: yataścāvinābhāve sati bādhā na sambhavati virodhāt,
SA15arhebt2u:4615: tasmāddhetoryathoktalakṣaṇasya prayoge sati gamyārthāyā api pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣaviruddhādīnāṃ sambhavo nāsti,
SA15arhebt2u:4619: kevalāyāḥ prayoge 'sti sambhava iti cet, āha- "nāpi" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4620: hetuprayoge hyasati kevalā pratijñaiva na prayujyate, hetuviṣayatvena tadabhyupagamāt /
SA15arhebt2u:4621: tataśca śāstrakārairna pratijñādoṣāḥ pratyakṣaviruddhādayo vācyā iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4622: diṅnāgapādaistu sādhyāsādhyaviparyayeṇa [Hbṭ_213] vipratipattidarśanādaprayogārhasyāpi pakṣasya lakṣaṇavidhāne nyāyaprāptamevāpakṣatva na ni(tvaṃ ni)
SA15arhebt2u:4628: paraḥ pṛcchati- "katham" iti kena prakāreṇa- yathā bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahānavasthānaṃ tathā pratihetvavinābhāvayorapi?
SA15arhebt2u:4633: yadi svasādhyabhāva eva bhavet, anyathā tallakṣaṇamavinābhāvo nāma hīyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:4634: yatraiva dharmiṇi sa tallakṣaṇa eko bhavati tatraiva dharmiṇi tasmādanyo 'pi pratiheturviruddhastena hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ bhavati? /
SA15arhebt2u:4635_0: ekasya hetoryat sādhyaṃ tabdādhakasya tadviruddhasyāparasya dharmasya bhāva eva nābhāve
SA15arhebt2u:4635_1: bhāvādavinābhāvāditi bādhayā samānaṃ bādhāsambhavena samānaḥ pratiheturiti tannirāsenaiva nirasta iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4637_0: "vastutaḥ" paramārthato yasya pratiheturna sambhavati kimasau samyagjñānasya viparyasya
SA15arhebt2u:4637_1: vopanyastasādhyaviparītajñānasya vā heturiṣṭo yato vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ tallakṣaṇamucyate,
SA15arhebt2u:4638: āhosvid yasya pratihetustatsādhyaviparītasādhako na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ sannapīti /
SA15arhebt2u:4640: yadi nāma purvo vikalpa uttaro vā tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4645: aśakyo niścayo yasya vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvasya sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4649: sa cānupalabhyamāno 'pi kadācit syāditi vastutastadabhāvo niścīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4651_0: nahi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tannimittāvinābhāvitayā
SA15arhebt2u:4651_1: ekena hetunā svasādhye sādhite punastatraiva dharmiṇi tallakṣaṇasya tadviruddhārthasādhakasya
SA15arhebt2u:4654: viruddhadharmasādhakasambhave ca tasyaiva svasādhyāvinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇato bhāvasiddhayayogāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:4655: syānmatam- yadi nāma prastutaḥ pratihetvasambhavo 'smābhirniścetumaśakyastathāpyasambhavatpratihetutvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvapratipāditaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ kasmānna bhavati?
SA15arhebt2u:4657: pratipādako yo dharmo hetostasyāniścitasvabhāvasya yasmāt tallakṣaṇatvaṃ pratipādakadharmatā na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:4659: nāpi sandhigdhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa heturbhavatīti na kaściddheturbhavediti hetvabhāvo vā ityasya samarthanam /
SA15arhebt2u:4661: syānmatam- yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasyaiva pratihetubhāvāt ahetutvaṃ bhavatu,
SA15arhebt2u:4662: yasya tu pratiyogī heturna dṛśyate sa vastuta evāsambhavatpratihetuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4663: na hi tatra vastutaḥ pratihetusambhavaḥ śaṅkayate,
SA15arhebt2u:4668_1: tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ pratihetorbbādhakasya sambhavaḥ sa yeṣāmapi tattulyalakṣaṇānāṃ
SA15arhebt2u:4668_2: pratiyogī na dṛśyate teṣvapi śaṅkāṃ pratihetusambhavaviṣayāmutpādayati /
SA15arhebt2u:4671: nahi tasyetareṇa kaścidviśeṣo 'sti, yatastatsambhavo na śaṅkayeta /
SA15arhebt2u:4674: atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvaniścāyako dṛṣṭapratihetoradṛṣṭapratiyogina iṣyate yataḥ pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkāstamupaiti /
SA15arhebt2u:4675: tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:4677: yatastato viśeṣāddheturekāntena niścayena nirastapratipakṣastathāvidhe dharmiṇi pratihetvasambhavāt svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:4678: yastathāvidho na bhavati tadviśeṣavirahāt dṛṣṭapratihetuḥ so 'tallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:4682: yathoktāvinābhāvavacanenaiva tannivṛtterityāha- "tathā ca hetau" tadviśeṣayogini "pratihetvasambhave" sati "vyarthā" niṣprayojanā "ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣeti" /
SA15arhebt2u:4683: yathoktaviśeṣāṅgīkarane tallakṣaṇasya pratihetorasambhavāt kasyaikasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate?
SA15arhebt2u:4686: vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvasiddhaye ca pratibandhalakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetāviṣyamāṇe viruddhāvyabhicāryapi hetvābhāso na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:4688: iti darśayannāha- "ataḥ" pratibandhalakṣaṇaviśeṣopagamāt "viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo hetvābhāsasya yallakṣaṇaṃ taddhīyeta" na sambhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:4690: hetoryadātmīyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadyuktayorhetvorekatra [Hbṭ_216] dharmiṇi virodhena parasparaviruddhasādhyasādhakatvenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārīti viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:4691: na ca tat pratibandhāṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:4692: nahi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratībandhavatyekatra hetau kvaciddharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyastallakṣastatraiva hetuḥ sambhavet,
SA15arhebt2u:4695: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetordvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4696: nanu yadi tathavidhāviśeṣasambhave sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate,
SA15arhebt2u:4699: tat kimuktaṃ hetvabhāvo vetyata āha- "na ca" naiva "tasya" viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya,
SA15arhebt2u:4701: "svarūpaṃ" tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ nirddiśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathāsmābhirnirdiṣṭaṃ yadrūpaṃ "pratītya" pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ ambhavāsambhavāvutpaśyāmaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4702: yatra sa viśeṣo nāsti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpita āgamāśraye 'numāne /
SA15arhebt2u:4703: yatra tvasti sa viśeṣo vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne tatra pratiyogino 'sambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4704: yata evaṃ tasmānnāstyeva bhavatāṃ sa viśeṣaḥ- bhavadbhirna jñāyata eva sa viśeṣa iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4705: tasmāt sarvatra yatrāpi pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatrāpi śaṅkayā pratiyogiviṣayayā bhavitavyam /
SA15arhebt2u:4707: yasyāpi hi pratiheturdṛṣṭasyāpi prāk praityogidarśanāditareṇa sarvakālamadṛṣṭapratiyoginā na kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate yaddarśanājjñāyeta ‘
SA15arhebt2u:4710: tathāpi paścāttatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra tattulyalakṣaṇe pratiyogisadbhāvaśaṅkā na nivartata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4711: syānmatam- yeṣu pratiyogī sambhavati teṣvaśyameva kadācidasāvupalabhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:4712: yeṣu tu puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi nopalabhyate teṣvasau nāstyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:4713: [Hbṭ_217] tataḥ sa tathāvidho heturbhaviṣyati, tat kathaṃ hetvabhāvo 'smākam?
SA15arhebt2u:4715: yeṣāmapi hi pratihetuḥ sambhavati teṣāmapi naiva sarvadā tasya pratihetorūpalabdhiḥ pratipattṝṇām /
SA15arhebt2u:4718: pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra tadāśaṅkākathaṃ kriyate? / tathā cāha-
SA15arhebt2u:4722: sa sarvavyavahāreṣu saṃśayātmā kṣayaṃ vrajet //" iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4724_0: tathā hi kasyacideva pramātuḥ kuśāgrīyamateratiśayavatī prajñā pratihetūtprekṣiṇī
SA15arhebt2u:4725: tenaiva prajñātiśayaśālinā pratihetava utprekṣitāḥ tatastaddarśanāt yāvajjīvaṃ adṛṣṭapratihetuṣvapi tadāśaṅkā na nivartate /
SA15arhebt2u:4734: yata evaṃ sarvatra pratiyogyāśaṅkā na nivartate bhavaddarśane tena kāraṇenāniścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavayoḥ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:4735: iha pratiyogī sambhavati iha tu na sambhavati'; ityevaṃrūpa iti /
SA15arhebt2u:4736: tasmādvastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ [Hbṭ_218] hetoḥ tasyāniścitatvādekasaṃkhyāvivakṣāvādināṃ na kaściddhetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:4740: iti amuṃ vikalpaṃ nirākṛtya dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ nirācikīrṣurāha- "athāpradarśitapratihetuḥ" samyagjñānaviparyaheturiṣṭa iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4741: ayaṃ ca pakṣaḥ kila diṅnāgācāryasyāpyabhimata iti para upadarśayannāha- "yathāha diṅnāgācāryaḥ" /
SA15arhebt2u:4743_0: "śrāvaṇatvasya hi na kathañcivdyavacchedahetutvam" iti diṅnāgācāryeṇokte pareṇābhihitam-
SA15arhebt2u:4743_1: "yadā tarhi vaiyākaraṇaḥ śabdatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaṃ nityamabhyupagacchati tadāyaṃ śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇaḥ
SA15arhebt2u:4744_0: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavat" ityevaṃ pareṇokte satyācāryeṇoktam- "yadyatra
SA15arhebt2u:4745: tadevāmācāryapādaiḥ sākṣitve datte bhujamutkṣipya śāstrakāraḥ pūtkurvannāha- "idamidānīm" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:4746: yadā hyācāryasyāpyetadabhimatamiti kaiścivdyākhyāyate tadidaṃ sumahavdyasanamāyātam- gurubhirabhihitatvādaprakāśyam,
SA15arhebt2u:4749: tat kiṃ gurūn dūṣayāma uta nyāyamapyupekṣāmahe ityubhayamapyaśakyamiti "kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta?" /
SA15arhebt2u:4751_0: kaḥ punaratra doṣo yenedaṃ kaṣṭataramityāha- "sa tāvadayaṃ" śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo "heturvastūni"
SA15arhebt2u:4751_1: śabdādīni svasādhyaṃ tattvaṃ nityatvaṃ "tatprakṛtīni" tadātmakāni "kṛtvā" tacchrāvaṇatvaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:4751_2: pramāṇaṃ yeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ mīmāṃsakavaiyākaraṇādīnāṃ tān "abhyudayena" [Hbṭ_219] svargeṇa
SA15arhebt2u:4752: tathā hi- vastutattvaṃ bhāvayan yāvat kleśānn prajahāti tāvat svargamāsādayati,
SA15arhebt2u:4754: athāvā śabdanityatvapratītau vedaprāmāṇyāt tadvihitāgnihotrānuṣṭhānāt svargo vedāntaniṣevaṇādaparvaggaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:4757_0: tāṃśca tatpramāṇakān puruṣān svargāpavargasampadaḥ pracyāvya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ
